reviews.review:
Super game maar weet niet of het nog steeds veel gespeeld wordt.
Zeer goed spel, voor het eerst gespeeld in 2010

Such a instant classic. I put sooo many hours into this game on the 360 and thought, why not get it for pc?
Fantastic game series (one of my favourites) simple game play, so much replayablity (although I loose intrest in a game very quick if there isnt any progression or customization this is a exeption) This is probably one of the only games that I find I need to be sticking with my team and feel like I relie on them alot of the time to save my ass from hunters and smokers. Great unique characters, had a fantastic sequel and cant wait for the rumored l4d3 which is rumored to realese this year which I would be suprised if that werent true.

Only thing is I wish it could have more campains but there is left 4 dead 2 which has new campains with the old too and the workshop which freshens the game.

Overall a must have for anyone into the fps genre.

There is no excuse to not have this game in your libery now if you are into fps, zombie games, horror, survival or all of the above.

----------------MUCHO CUIDADO AL COMPRAR L4D (Este, el 1)-------------------
-
El juego es muy muy bueno y entretenido, mucho mas aun si tienes amigos y sino puedes conseguirlos jugando online ... eso en su secuela, el L4D2 (tambien esta en Steam).

Este primer juego es bueno y todo pero NO LO JUEGA NADIE, esta practicamente vacio.
Ademas, todo el contenido que tiene este juego lo tiene su secuela L4D2 (y aun mas contenido, claro).
-
Lo pongo como no recomendado no porque el juego sea malo en si o no funcione, sino porque es un gasto innecesario de dinero (yo compre en paquete ambos juegos... luego me di cuenta que el 1 esta vacio).
-
Asi que en resumen, el juego es bueno pero no hay gente que lo juegue porque juegan su secuela que tiene todo el contenido de la saga, asi que recomiendo comprar el Left 4 Dead 2

I can only find one negative about this game and that is that you can't use the sights on any weapon except the sniper. That's it!

Zombies, guns, blood-pumping action (at times), and Unique Zombies. 

Ever wanted to get thrown up on by a particularly well-fed Zombie? Boomer's got your back.
Ever wanted your face ripped to shreds? The Hunter is here for ya. 
Ever wanted to smoke, yet you're underage (I know that some of you ignore the ESRB rating)? The Smoker can hook you up.
Ever wanted to get a hug from a big, strong hug that will probably kill you? The Tank is always there to help.

Also, the Zombies run. They aren't helpless in this game. Then again, neither are you.

It's 2017, got this game around the time it came out, I have over 200 games, this one still has the most time sunk into it. Tells you right there.

What I didn't know is that when I bought L4D2 first and played that, is that it already had the old character in it. And I thought "wow, I just wasted 4.99$ on a game that is already in another game. But what I didn't realize is that L4D "versus" isn't dead.  I love to play versus on the original because L4D2 has game servers called "Hentai Rape" and that's fucked up. I would recommend if you want to buy it, but it doesn't' have a workshop on steam and I don't want to go through the hassle of manually downloading it. Everyone just moved on from that game and bought L4D2. Recommend to people who like to play the classics.
